snippet.title: In the Shadows
snippet.description:
Go backward in time by taking all the pills in each level and hiding from the eye that watches you, to discover what it is and why it looks after you.

You can play it on:

Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/709560
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/in-the-shadows/332911
itch.io: https://mapedorr.itch.io/in-the-shadows

Made with Phaser [https://phaser.io/].
Music and sound effects by Esteban Lagger [https://www.facebook.com/esteban.lagger.7].
Some mechanics were taken from Game Mechanic Explorer [http://gamemechanicexplorer.com/].
